name: Overweed
description:
Game made for VimJam 2: Boss [8 Bits to Infinity]

It is possible to play in browser, but I highly recommend to download the game for best experience.

Play as a bored office worker seeking "Inspiration". Avoid your boss while looking for the "Good stuff".

Let's be honest it's a game about getting high while at work, god I hope it won't be taken down.

The level is completely procedurally generated, so there is a small chance that some things might be missing. (I mean really small chance)

Controls:
WASD to move
Shift to sprint
Right Mouse Button to interact
